website_summaries.verdict: This is a quality product that can add a level of safety to your truck bed.
pros: Folds to the front of the truck bed
Does a good job of keeping your items dry
cons: Some of the clips are made from plastic and could be made with a more durable material

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, latches well. Keeps out most rain (slight intrusion in corners at times). Had to add screws to hold cable track in place. While it only took 5 minutes and $2 in self tapping screws....it was pretty disappointing it needed extra as it is far from cheapest model available. I added zip ties to the cables as they get caught in track making it hard to open. This is same as Backflip 2 according to the guy on the phone that helped me with an install question.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pankow

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and finish, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: This was a super easy install on my 2018 F-150. In addition to the locking tailgate, this creates a safe and attractive locking cover on my bed. Used it the day after installation to haul stuff home from Ikea and it worked great. Shipper was super fast and communicative.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed cover.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but durable and well made for my purposes. There were some minor dents and scratches in the framing that were obviously from the manufacturing and not due to shipping., but they were in areas that would not show and didn't seem to interfere in performance. I like the cover a lot. Looks sharp and sits flush to the rail guards.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Great mostly secure cover
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year after install the quality holds up nicely. There is a bit of leakage, mostly in the front corners, when driving when the pressure can push the water past the seal. The only way to get into the bed when everything is locked is to pop the back cover which will leave visible damage so i don't worry about things disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in literally 15 mins with nothing more than a Phillips screwdriver and a crescent wrench. Fits perfect an looks great
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked good and looked good also. The only problem was that the release cables like to tuck themselves into the channel were they go and you have to fish them out. I fixed this problem with some zip ties and it didn't happen anymore. That's really my only complaint about the product.
customer_reviews.author: miguel rios

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had a soft cover on my last truck. This hard top is well worth the extra money. Looks sharp and is very durable. Easy to install, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick installation
customer_reviews.text: The folding cover is as advertised. Easy and quick installation. I do have one negative to comment on, the release cables are not easily accessible. I installed zip ties on each side of the cabling to hang down so I can release the latches. It works but didn't expect to alter a brand new product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, but cheap and flimsy quick release clips
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and looks great, but the plastic clips on the straps that hold it down in the half covered position snapped off in the mounts , and there was no way I was going to uninstall it and ship it back to Amazon just because of the size and the cost of shipping. Other than that It's an excellent cover, and installing it was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, shipped quickly and keeping my truck bed dry and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I really love this Tonneau cover
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Tonneau cover, it was easy to install, looks great and provides a minimal level of security by keeping my stuff out of sight of passers-by.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Had the cover for about 2 months. It was easy to install, it works well, it looks nice. I have had a few drops of rainwater get through in heavy rains, but not much. It is the perfect combination of functionality (access to the bed by folding it open) and security for my property.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: but i love the
customer_reviews.text: one of the rails was bent a bit. had to fix, but i love the product
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great but does leak a bit around the front edges.
customer_reviews.author: William Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Almost $1000.00. The sections are delaminating and seperating and it is all faded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks on 2017 F150 no matter what I tried.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because it's very versatile however it leaked like crazy in the 2017 F150. I tried everything from taking it off ( pain in the A** by the way) to using over a bottle and a half of clear silicone sealant. It just still leaves in places it shouldn't. For the price it should have much better seals in place...
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: The installation directions were clear and it was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged well, plenty of shipping protection. The installation directions were clear and it was easy to install. Single handed, took about 45 minutes. The fit and Finish of the cover was perfect. I didn't give 5 stars because it's a bit pricey at $900.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, Needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Quality material and easy to install but the design details are not up to par for the price. The cover can be forced open easily by pushing it over to the left or right and pulling up. I had to modify mine by adding brackets to fix the problem. It is also hard to handle if exposed to the sun for extended periods. I almost burn my hand every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cover!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cover and warranty! I have an FX3 that is less than 1 year old. The seals are curling up on the back of the cover, as well as the side seals have pulled away from the back seal and are curling up. The truck is garage kept, so weathers not an issue. The company sent me new seals, but there is no way I would be able to replace them, and have them look at all near the way they looked when I bought the cover. Almost $1000, and To say I’m disappointed is an understatement. Don’t buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Edvan

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE--VERY LIMITED WARRANTY COVERAGE
customer_reviews.text: We purchased an FX5 cover for $800+. After 2 years, it began falling apart. Auto-customs said they only stood behind it for 1 year. Here is what happened in a recent rainstorm.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Michalski

product_meta.title: Gator FX3 Hard Folding Tonneau Truck Bed Cover 2015-2018 Ford F150 5.5 FT Bed
feature_bullets: Fits Only - Gator FX3 Hard Folding Tonneau Truck Bed Cover 2015-2018 Ford F150 5.5 FT Bed
Panels constructed of aluminum with an FRP coating on top
EPDM seals provide maximum water resistance
Fiberglass Reinforced Polymer exterior panel stays cooler to the touch and will not fade
Made in the USA - 2 Year Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
